overview: DR. SHERMAN has been studying the SUBJECT for over 3 years, a patient who has the unique ability to manipulate his surroundings using the power of his mind. Restrained in a high security facility and studied under a microscope, Dr, Sherman struggles to identify the source of the subject's "abilities"... that is until the Doctor realises his patient is leaving him a series of clues.  'Become One' is a promotional video made for the launch of the original PlayStationÂ®Portable.
title: Become One
